state_summary: The UK government's British Business Bank launches a £500 million package to support diverse and underrepresented fund managers and founders, with a focus on female-led venture funds and backing more diverse fund managers.
evidence: The initiative aims to reduce the significant gap in venture capital investment for underrepresented founders and investors.
At least 50% of investment will go to female fund managers.
Around 13% of venture teams in the U.K. have women at a senior level, while less than 2% of venture funding goes to minorities.
keywords: UK government, British Business Bank, diverse fund managers, underrepresented founders
